page.content: adventure training and spend one evening a week in Aspatria and spend week-ends and two weeks in summer at Army training camps.The present strenghth is 33 boys with one officer and two adult n.c.o.'s. Beacon Hill school runs night classes during the winter months and these provide for a wide range of interests. This school is also the base for the Adult Literacy Scheme which provides help via volunteer teachers under the guidance of a Key Teacher for those adults who have reading and writing difficulties. Other pursuits include fishing in the River Ellen and Brayton pond,leek growing and pigeon racing. Once a year in July the Carnival takesplace when decorated lorries go in proccesion through the streets and many people dress in fancy dress.
